allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
chore: upgrade to Expo SDK 54 and React Native 0.81

- Upgrade Expo SDK from 53 to 54.0.13
- Upgrade React Native from 0.79 to 0.81.4
- Upgrade React from 19.0 to 19.1.0
- Update all Expo packages to SDK 54 compatible versions
- Migrate from deprecated expo-av to expo-audio
- Update lucide-react-native to 0.546.0 for React 19 compatibility
- Fix Expo Router 6 navigation layout patterns
- Add comprehensive project documentation
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement WCAG 2.2 accessibility and Supabase integration planning

Accessibility (WCAG 2.2 Level AA compliance):
- Add comprehensive accessibility constants and utilities
- Implement accessible Button component with roles, labels, and states
- Implement accessible Input component with error announcements
- Create complete WCAG 2.2 documentation and guidelines
- Fix deprecated SafeAreaView usage
- Support Dynamic Type with font size limits
- Ensure 44pt minimum touch targets
- Document color contrast ratios (4.5:1 normal, 3:1 large text)

Supabase Integration Planning:
- Install @supabase/supabase-js package
- Create optional Supabase client configuration
- Design complete database schema (profiles, projects, inventory)
- Write 7 SQL migration files with RLS policies
- Plan storage buckets for images and PDFs
- Create data migration script from AsyncStorage
- Document setup guide and architecture

Responsive Design:
- Make login screen fully responsive (small devices, tablets)
- Make register screen fully responsive (all screen sizes)
- Add dimension-based scaling and max-width constraints
- Improve text wrapping and touch target sizing

Documentation:
- Add comprehensive development standards (CLAUDE.md)
- Create Supabase architecture documentation
- Add accessibility testing checklists
- Update decision matrices and resource links
EOF
)")

Bash(for key in itemNotFound deleteItem ballSpecs totalSpecs recommendedHook weightCategory handleType itemDetails sizeConversions purchaseInfo purchaseDate price store usedInProjects dateAdded lastUpdated lastUsed setSize type location editItem)
Bash(for type in stitchMarker scissors needle tapestryNeedle yarnNeedle gauge rowCounter measuringTape stitchHolder patternBook organizer blockingPins pompomMaker storage other)
Bash(for key in tags tapered texture thumbRest title tryDifferentFilter type)

Bash(bash -c 'grep -roh ""t\(''''inventory\\.[^'''']*''''\)"" app/ components/ hooks/ 2>/dev/null | sed ""s/t\(''''inventory\\.//"" | sed ""s/''''\)$//"" | sort -u > /tmp/used.txt; cat /tmp/used.txt | while read key; do grep -q ""    $key:"" translations/en.ts || echo ""MISSING: inventory.$key""; done')

Bash(bash -c 'for key in itemAdded itemUpdated itemDeleted startInventory stock unit scanningBarcode productFound productNotFound reviewInfo lookupFailed; do echo -n ""$key: ""; grep -r ""inventory\\.$key"" app/ components/ hooks/ 2>/dev/null | wc -l; done')
Bash(for key in emailNotConfirmed tooManyRequests serviceUnavailable registrationFailed emailAlreadyExists passwordTooWeak checkYourEmail confirmationEmailSent passwordMinLength)
Bash(for file in en de sl ru)

Bash(bash -c 'ANON=$\(grep EXPO_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY /Users/sebastjanm/dev/SeboAI-crochet-tracker/.env | cut -d= -f2\) && curl -s ""https://wpslbhiecxiwhfncpbgs.supabase.co/rest/v1/projects?user_id=eq.46265084-28e1-4bc6-8f8f-d1d5ea90cd63&select=id,title,deleted,updated_at&order=updated_at.desc&limit=5"" -H ""apikey: $ANON"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $ANON"" | jq .')

Bash(bash -c 'ANON=$\(grep EXPO_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY /Users/sebastjanm/dev/SeboAI-crochet-tracker/.env | cut -d= -f2\) && curl -s ""https://wpslbhiecxiwhfncpbgs.supabase.co/rest/v1/projects?select=id,title,deleted,user_id,updated_at&order=updated_at.desc&limit=10"" -H ""apikey: $ANON"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $ANON"" | jq .')

Bash(bash -c 'SECRET=$\(grep SUPABASE_SECRET_KEY /Users/sebastjanm/dev/SeboAI-crochet-tracker/.env | cut -d= -f2 | tr -d ""\\r""\)

# List and delete files in each orphaned folder
for FOLDER in ""14b10f4f-736c-4370-9654-4df2c32150d1"" ""1766858695621-pseis6ijo"" ""71af597b-a77b-4f33-a7e1-ebca20261297"" ""c2908281-0c43-4cfd-9510-17ba79704cbe"" ""cb8323b4-c6a4-4362-884e-12197a22468c""; do
  echo ""=== Deleting folder: $FOLDER ===""
  
  # List files in folder
  FILES=$\(curl -s -X POST ""https://wpslbhiecxiwhfncpbgs.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/list/project-images"" \\
    -H ""apikey: $SECRET"" \\
    -H ""Authorization: Bearer $SECRET"" \\
    -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" \\
    -d ""{\\""prefix\\"": \\""46265084-28e1-4bc6-8f8f-d1d5ea90cd63/$FOLDER\\""}"" | jq -r "".[].name""\)
  
  for FILE in $FILES; do
    FULL_PATH=""46265084-28e1-4bc6-8f8f-d1d5ea90cd63/$FOLDER/$FILE""
    echo ""  Deleting: $FULL_PATH""
    curl -s -X DELETE ""https://wpslbhiecxiwhfncpbgs.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/project-images/$FULL_PATH"" \\
      -H ""apikey: $SECRET"" \\
      -H ""Authorization: Bearer $SECRET""
  done
done

echo """"
echo ""=== Done ===""')

Bash(bash -c 'SECRET=$\(grep SUPABASE_SECRET_KEY /Users/sebastjanm/dev/SeboAI-crochet-tracker/.env | cut -d= -f2 | tr -d ""\\r""\) && echo ""=== Inventory Items with images ==="" && curl -s ""https://wpslbhiecxiwhfncpbgs.supabase.co/rest/v1/inventory_items?user_id=eq.46265084-28e1-4bc6-8f8f-d1d5ea90cd63&select=id,name,images,deleted_at"" -H ""apikey: $SECRET"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $SECRET"" | jq "".[] | {id: .id[0:20], name: .name[0:25], images: \(.images | if . then length else 0 end\), deleted: .deleted_at}""')

Bash(bash -c 'SECRET=$\(grep SUPABASE_SECRET_KEY /Users/sebastjanm/dev/SeboAI-crochet-tracker/.env | cut -d= -f2 | tr -d ""\\r""\) && echo ""=== Inventory items image URLs ==="" && curl -s ""https://wpslbhiecxiwhfncpbgs.supabase.co/rest/v1/inventory_items?user_id=eq.46265084-28e1-4bc6-8f8f-d1d5ea90cd63&select=id,name,images"" -H ""apikey: $SECRET"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $SECRET"" | jq -r "".[] | select\(.images != null and \(.images | length\) > 0\) | \\""\\\(.name\): \\\(.images[0]\)\\""""')

Bash(bash -c 'SECRET=$\(grep SUPABASE_SECRET_KEY /Users/sebastjanm/dev/SeboAI-crochet-tracker/.env | cut -d= -f2 | tr -d ""\\r""\) && curl -s ""https://wpslbhiecxiwhfncpbgs.supabase.co/rest/v1/inventory_items?user_id=eq.46265084-28e1-4bc6-8f8f-d1d5ea90cd63&select=id,name,images"" -H ""apikey: $SECRET"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $SECRET"" | jq -r "".[] | select\(.images\) | select\(.images | length > 0\) | .images[]"" | sed ""s|.*/46265084-28e1-4bc6-8f8f-d1d5ea90cd63/||"" | cut -d/ -f1 | sort -u')

Bash(bash -c 'SECRET=$\(grep SUPABASE_SECRET_KEY /Users/sebastjanm/dev/SeboAI-crochet-tracker/.env | cut -d= -f2 | tr -d ""\\r""\) && echo ""=== Remaining inventory storage ==="" && curl -s -X POST ""https://wpslbhiecxiwhfncpbgs.supabase.co/storage/v1/object/list/inventory-images"" -H ""apikey: $SECRET"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $SECRET"" -H ""Content-Type: application/json"" -d ""{\\""prefix\\"": \\""46265084-28e1-4bc6-8f8f-d1d5ea90cd63\\""}"" | jq -r "".[].name""')

Bash(bash -c 'SECRET=$\(grep SUPABASE_SECRET_KEY /Users/sebastjanm/dev/SeboAI-crochet-tracker/.env | cut -d= -f2 | tr -d ""\\r""\) && curl -s ""https://wpslbhiecxiwhfncpbgs.supabase.co/rest/v1/projects?user_id=eq.46265084-28e1-4bc6-8f8f-d1d5ea90cd63&select=id,title,deleted_at,updated_at&order=updated_at.desc"" -H ""apikey: $SECRET"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $SECRET"" | jq "".[] | {title: .title[0:30], deleted: .deleted_at}""')

Bash(bash -c 'SECRET=$\(grep SUPABASE_SECRET_KEY /Users/sebastjanm/dev/SeboAI-crochet-tracker/.env | cut -d= -f2 | tr -d ""\\r""\) && echo ""=== PROJECTS ==="" && curl -s ""https://wpslbhiecxiwhfncpbgs.supabase.co/rest/v1/projects?user_id=eq.46265084-28e1-4bc6-8f8f-d1d5ea90cd63&select=id,title,created_at&deleted_at=is.null&order=created_at.desc"" -H ""apikey: $SECRET"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $SECRET"" | jq "".[] | {title: .title[0:30], created: .created_at[0:10]}""')

Bash(bash -c 'SECRET=$\(grep SUPABASE_SECRET_KEY /Users/sebastjanm/dev/SeboAI-crochet-tracker/.env | cut -d= -f2 | tr -d ""\\r""\) && echo ""=== INVENTORY ==="" && curl -s ""https://wpslbhiecxiwhfncpbgs.supabase.co/rest/v1/inventory_items?user_id=eq.46265084-28e1-4bc6-8f8f-d1d5ea90cd63&select=id,name,created_at&deleted_at=is.null&order=created_at.desc"" -H ""apikey: $SECRET"" -H ""Authorization: Bearer $SECRET"" | jq "".[] | {name: .name[0:25], created: .created_at[0:10]}""')
